timeline.message: add tsv to recognized extensions for mimetype determination

enable direct upload/ingest of text/tsv

when no mimetype is assigned by the browser
use mimetype determination by extension for direct upload

timeline.bodyText: Do we care if the suppliedContentType is blank or null?
timeline.author: sekmiller

replies.bodyText: That should already be being caught (e.g. in the EditDatafilesPage.handleExternalUpload method) but worth a safety check here probably. And we shouldn't replace the default with a null/blank response if determineFileTypeByExtension returns null/blank.
replies.author: qqmyers

replies.bodyText: If you make that change, I'll put this into QA. Thanks!
replies.author: sekmiller

timeline.message: still check if suppliedType was blank

Use same rules for replacing mimetypes in direct upload

as in normal upload. This will replace generic types as in this issue as
well as replace text/tab-separated-value mimetypes so that tsv files get
ingested and will stop the browser supplied mimetypes for r, stata, etc.
in the same way that normal upload does.

timeline.bodyText: just moved and made to return a boolean, no logic changes.
timeline.author: qqmyers
